main event: A witness reported seeing strange lights in the sky that performed a sharp climb and disappeared rapidly and silently.
interesting points: The object's movement and lack of noise were unlike any aircraft the witness had seen before.
The witness was previously employed at a nearby air force base and was familiar with most known aircraft.
The witness reported the sighting to the chief on April 7, 1964.
The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes.
The object appeared to be a strange grayish-white light, slightly brighter than the full moon.
sighted object: strange grayish-white light, brighter than the full moon
